health_check.description: Check if the service is running

generate.description: Generate text based on the input prompt

request.prompt: string (required) - The input text to generate from
request.max_length: integer (optional) - Maximum length of generated text, default: 100
request.temperature: float (optional) - Controls randomness in generation, default: 0.7
request.model_name: string (optional) - Model to use, default: microsoft/phi-2

response.processing_time: float - Time taken to generate in seconds
response.model_used: string - Name of the model used

documentation.description: Get the API documentation in JSON format

error_responses.500: Internal Server Error - Model generation failed
